001package Face_Plugins;
002
003import ij.ImagePlus;
004import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
005import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
006import imagingbook.lib.ij.IjUtils;
007import imagingbook.lib.util.ResourceLocation;
008
009/**
010 * ImageJ plugin. 
011 * @author WB
012 *
013 */
014public class Open_Sample_Image implements PlugIn {
015        
016        static ResourceLocation loc = new imagingbook.violajones.data.images.Resources();
017        
018        String imgName = null;
019
020        @Override
021        public void run(String arg) {
022                if (!runDialog()) return;
023                
024                ImagePlus im = IjUtils.openImage(loc.getResourcePath(imgName));
025                im.show();
026        }
027
028        private boolean runDialog() {
029                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog("Set Face Detector Parameters");
030                String[] fileNames = loc.getResourceNames();
031                gd.addChoice("Sample image", fileNames, fileNames[0]);
032                
033                gd.showDialog();
034                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
035                        return false;
036                }
037                
038                imgName = gd.getNextChoice();
039                return true;
040        }
041}
